name: ALOpsAppCompiler
description: Compile AL Extensions for Business Central
author: Hodor
helpMarkDown: Compile a Business Central extension from AL code.

inputs.name: usedocker
inputs.label: In Docker
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run task in Docker container. $(usedocker)

inputs.name: fixed_tag
inputs.label: Fixed Container Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows recycling of docker containers. $(fixed_tag)

inputs.name: targetproject
inputs.label: Target Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the project to compile. Must be a fully qualified path or relative to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory). $(targetproject)

inputs.name: nav_computername
inputs.label: Computer Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target Business Central Server running service tier. $(nav_computername)

inputs.name: nav_serverinstance
inputs.label: Server Instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Business Central Server Instance Name. $(nav_serverinstance)

inputs.name: nav_tenant
inputs.label: NAV Tenant
inputs.helpMarkDown: NAV Tenant used for symbols and compiling the app. $(nav_tenant)

inputs.name: nav_ports_dev
inputs.label: NAV Dev-Port
inputs.helpMarkDown: NAV Port used for DEV-Service. $(nav_ports_dev)

inputs.name: bc_username
inputs.label: BC Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: BC Username for ServiceTier connection. $(bc_username)

inputs.name: bc_password
inputs.label: BC Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: BC User Password for ServiceTier connection. $(bc_password)

inputs.name: al_compiler_version
inputs.label: AL Compiler
inputs.helpMarkDown: AL Compiler version used for compiling. $(al_compiler_version)

inputs.name: ruleset
inputs.label: Force Ruleset
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrule the Ruleset from VSCode settings. Path relative to [alsourcepath] $(ruleset)

inputs.name: al_analyzer
inputs.label: AL Analyzer
inputs.helpMarkDown: AL Analyzer(s) used for compiling. (Example: CodeCop,UICop) $(al_analyzer)

inputs.name: nav_app_version
inputs.label: App Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Template for versioning NAV-Apps. '*' is replaced by the current Build Number. $(nav_app_version)

inputs.name: vsix_download_path
inputs.label: VSIX Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alternative VSIX download url. $(vsix_download_path)

inputs.name: use_ssl
inputs.label: Use SSL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use SSL for Business Central connections. $(use_ssl)

inputs.name: download_test_symbols
inputs.label: Download Test Symbols
inputs.helpMarkDown: Download Test Symbols explicitly (without Test-Version reference in App.json). $(download_test_symbols)

inputs.name: usecompression
inputs.label: Compress Source File for Transfer
inputs.helpMarkDown: Compress Source-Folder for transfer to docker container. $(usecompression)

inputs.name: publish_artifact
inputs.label: Publish Artifact
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publish generated App Artifact to DevOps. $(publish_artifact)

inputs.name: failed_on_warnings
inputs.label: Fail on Warnings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail task when any warning occurs. $(failed_on_warnings)

inputs.name: app_file_suffix
inputs.label: Suffix for App filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set a suffix tag on the compiled App filename. $(app_file_suffix)

inputs.name: updatebuildnumber
inputs.label: Update Build Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the Build number with the current version. $(updatebuildnumber)

inputs.name: setup_working_folder
inputs.label: Setup Working Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Copy working folder to Docker container. $(setup_working_folder)
